title: T206 HOF PORTRAIT lot of 15 for sale SOLD
author: drdduet

posts.post_title: T206 HOF PORTRAIT lot of 15 for sale SOLD
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is this attractive collection of the highly desirable T206 portrait subjects.  Included--

Tinker
Evers
Chance
Brown
Keeler
Young
Johnson
Waddell
Bresnahan
Clarke
Griffith
Joss
Bender
Beckley
E. Collins

Great lot.  Contact me at [url]darren.duet@chouest.com[/url] for scans/inquiries.  Price on this lot is $2000. SOLD  First to commit to my email gets. it.

If the winner of this lot would like to sell a few cards --- please shoot me a line

[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
